### Welcome!

I am a PhD candidate at the University of Houston. 

I am an applied microeconomics working on development and environmental economics. 

My research addresses critical issues such as deforestation and air pollution, aiming to develop effective policies to mitigate these challenges. 

I am a nature enthusiast and soccer lover.
